TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICredentialPolicy

summary.span: 定義用於資源要求 (使用 及其衍生類別 (Derived Class) 所提出) 的認證原則。

span.span: Defines the credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using and its derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 認證原則可決定是否要傳送時，傳送認證網路資源，例如 Web 網頁內容。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果傳送認證，需要用戶端驗證的伺服器，可以嘗試驗證用戶端，而不是傳送回應，指出用戶端的認證所收到要求時。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response that indicates that the client's credentials are required. 雖然這可以節省往返到伺服器，此效能改善必須平衡跨網路傳送認證的固有的安全性風險。While this saves a round trip to the server, this performance gain must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 當目的地伺服器不需要用戶端驗證時，最好不要將傳送的認證。When the destination server does not require client authentication, it is best not to send credentials. > [!NOTE] > 原則會叫用，只有當或相關聯要求有認證不`null`。 policies are invoked only if the or the that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`. 設定此原則會有不會影響未指定認證的要求。Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials. 使用屬性來設定原則。Use the property to set an policy. 控制代碼驗證要求將會叫用方法，然後再執行驗證。The that handles authentication for the request will invoke the method before performing the authentication. 如果此方法會傳回`false`，不會執行驗證。If the method returns `false`, authentication is not performed. 原則會影響的所有執行個體使用目前的應用程式定義域中的非 null 認證。An policy affects all instances of with non-null credentials in the current application domain. 無法覆寫原則，以在個別的要求。The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示實作這個介面，允許只會針對以特定的主機為目標的要求傳送的認證。The following code example shows an implementation of this interface that permits credentials to be sent only for requests that target specific hosts. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ShouldSendCredential (Uri challengeUri, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authenticationModule);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSendCredential(class System.Uri challengeUri, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, class System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authenticationModule) cil managed
Public Function ShouldSendCredential (challengeUri As Uri, request As WebRequest, credential As NetworkCredential, authenticationModule As IAuthenticationModule) As Boolean
public: bool ShouldSendCredential(Uri ^ challengeUri, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ credential, System::Net::IAuthenticationModule ^ authenticationModule);
abstract member ShouldSendCredential : Uri * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.NetworkCredential * System.Net.IAuthenticationModule -> bool

span.span: The that will receive the request.
The that represents the resource being requested.

param.name: credential
param.span: 如果此方法傳回 ，則 將與要求一起傳送。

span.span: The that will be sent with the request if this method returns .

param.name: authenticationModule
param.span: 將執行驗證的 ，如果需要驗證。

span.span: The that will conduct the authentication, if authentication is required.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指出用戶端認證是否與資源要求 (使用 類別執行個體所提出) 一起傳送。

span.span: Returns a that indicates whether the client's credentials are sent with a resource request made using an instance of the class.

returns.span: 如果認證與要求一起傳送，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the credentials are sent with the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後藉由設定已指定原則屬性，該控制代碼驗證叫用方法，然後再執行驗證。After an policy has been specified by setting the property, the that handles authentication for a invokes the method before performing the authentication. 如果此方法傳回`false`，不會執行驗證。If this method returns `false`, authentication is not performed. 當原始要求已重新導向，或需要 proxy 驗證時，所識別的資源`challengeUri`可能會不同於要求中指定的資源。When the original request has been redirected or proxy authentication is required, the resource identified by `challengeUri` can be different from the requested resource that is specified in . 在重新導向的情況下`challengeUri`包含實際目的地。In the case of redirection, `challengeUri` contains the actual destination . 如果需要，proxy 驗證`challengeUri`包含要求用戶端驗證的 proxy 伺服器位址。If proxy authentication is required, `challengeUri` contains the address of the proxy server that requires client authentication.
